title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.20 - Theft or loss
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 80.20 - Theft or loss

State Regulations

The licensee shall promptly notify the department of any theft or loss or any controlled substance. Such theft or loss shall be reported on forms furnished by the department. Thefts shall be reported whether or not the controlled substances are subsequently recovered, the responsible parties identified or action taken against them. Notes

80.20

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
